website_summaries.verdict: A first-rate microwave oven that delivers an unparalleled combination of quality and value.
pros: Provides 2- and 3-stage cooking at 6 different power levels
Grab-and-go handles are stylish and versatile
Stainless steel front ensures the microwave oven will maintain its appearance for an extended period of time
Easily accommodates dinner plates, large casserole dishes, glass bowls, coffee mugs, and other common kitchenware
cons: Beeps multiple times when food is done, which may be annoying to some users

website_summaries.verdict: More powerful and spacious than other compact microwaves – but you pay for the power. One of the few to include Braille on its keypad.
pros: At 1000W, it's higher powered than many others
Enough power for use in restaurants, convenience stores, offices, hotels and other high-traffic settings
Employs bottom energy feed system for quick, efficient cooking
Touch control keypad operates 20 menus and 6 power levels
Convenient, powerful and more spacious than other compact microwaves
cons: More expensive than other compact microwaves

customer_reviews.title: Died after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 6 of these for a program that uses them everyday for about an hour. They worked great for the first year, then one by one they have lost their ability to heat things up. At first I thought it was just one having an issue, but the third one has now dies out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jolynne Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Worst product I've ever used! Ever!! I mean, ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microwave hoping to have a solid unit for our school. Upon first use, I tried microwaving some refrigerated rice on high power for 1:30. After the bell sounded, I took out the food and it had not been heated--at all! So, I tried again, this time on high for 2:00. The bells sounded, same result, the food had not been heated. I tried a third time, this time for 4:00. The bell sounded, same result, the food had not been heated.! According to my Minnesota math, that is a total of 7:30 of heating time on high, and the food is as cold as it was when I put it in. Clearly this unit does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nehring

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. When our 89 year old mom forgot how ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. When our 89 year old mom forgot how to use the other micro wave with all the buttons and a digital clock to confuse her more we did some research and found this on Amazon. Though it did take her a week to adjust she is finally using it daily for all the meals we prepare and take to her house. It is so easy to use and is a very powerful yet a good size to fit on her counter and can put full plate sizes in. What's also nice it only goes to 6 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Casteel

customer_reviews.title: The microwave only works intermittently.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the microwave for about two days and it only works intermittently. When I turn the dial to start the microwave, sometimes it works (about one out of every 10 attempts), but the rest of the times it does not come on. Sometimes the numbers light up, but no heat, sometimes the numbers don't even light up at all. I open and close the door a bunch a times and that seems to help more often than not, but basically this thing is a piece of junk. I am returning it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for people with vision or memory problems
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 96 year old Dad, who has low vision/some memory impairment and was having trouble operating his old microwave. It turned out to be a very good choice. At 96, most people have a little trouble adapting to new appliances, but this is so simple to operate that he had no trouble with it. He loves it. And we feel it's a safer option for him too. Panasonic did a great job with this product.
customer_reviews.author: kesmarn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is a microwave stripped down to its bare essentials. There isn't a popcorn cycle, there is no turntable (the antenna rotates inside of the case so that everything heats evenly), and there isn't a defrost cycle. There's just a rotary timer. Pure simplicity!
customer_reviews.author: Anne e Nonomous

customer_reviews.title: Great Find!  Works well, takes up very little space, looks good.
customer_reviews.text: We are amazed at this little microwave. Our needs are that of just heating up a cup of soup, water, butter, or reheating a slice of pizza, or some such snack It is the best! It takes up little counter space, and works like a champ. We love the dial. It is simple and straight forward to operate. It has a good amount of power and is a snap to clean. We also love that it has a handle instead of a button to push to open it. We couldn't be happier with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Bad Microwave, Bad warranty policy, Bad Service
customer_reviews.text: I've been a panasonic customer for years in our business. We bought this model for the first time last March. It is no good. It's lost is melting power after 6 months of use. The 1025-F is a better model. I am more upset with the warranty policy of Panasonic. Instead of replacing this microwave, I have to mail it to an independent repair center to be fixed. That doesn't help us in our production process, as I need a microwave daily. I will have to buy a new microwave and use this one as a backup if it can be fixed. Poor service on Panasonic's part.
customer_reviews.author: calvin

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately a friend with electronic experience replaced a $
customer_reviews.text: The first week it died. Fortunately a friend with electronic experience replaced a $.90 part and it has been fine since. But the replacement part was not the original. Instead, it was a much higher quality part which probably explains why it is still working. Thankfully I did not have to go thru the warranty hassle with Panasonic. If I ever need to replace this microwave it will not be another Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleaning, will last you a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: One of the most important things to know about this microwave is that it does not utilize a turntable. Commercial microwave ovens use two separate magnetos that allow for the food to be evenly cooked without a turntable. This makes for easy cleaning, no need to scrape food from small crevasses inside the unit. At 1000 watts, it is quite powerful. I would recommend it to anyone who wants a quality product that will last for years. I have purchased one for my home and one for a relative. Very well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Graebener

customer_reviews.title: Burns to the touch on the outside, top and inside!
customer_reviews.text: AVOID THIS MODEL FOR SAFETY REASONS. I've never had a microwave that overheats inside and outside like this unit. It burned to the touch not only inside the micro, but on the sides and top. This is crazy. It's a microwave not a convection oven! We had to return it within 48 hours. Manufacturer should recall all these models, voluntarily or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: June Muller

customer_reviews.title: Defective product, Horrible Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this September 2018 and died 11/27/18. Defective product, poor quality. Tried contacting customer support and nobody picked up. Do not purchase Panasonic products.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in a year and one month
customer_reviews.text: It is one month beyond the warranty and it is not working. The light comes on, the timer runs, it makes noise like it dd when working but does not heat anything. We paid more to get this industrial unit thinking it would last longer. It has been used only in our home (2 people) and we clean it regularly and don't use it that much. Repair cost is too high. Read online that microwaves last about 9 years. Am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: WE

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this little microwave oven
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this little microwave oven. It's just the right size for our office break room. I especially love that I don't have to contend with a heavy rotating plate, which makes it easier to clean. And I love the dial, which I just turn to the desired cook time instead of punching in the numbers. It looks good on the counter, easy to clean, easy to operate and is a perfect size. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Lemon
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave this thing two stars, because it broke on me after 7 months and I read here that the warrantee was only 6 months. Turns out the warrantee was for a year and Panasonic responded to the issue in a timely fashion. I was only without a microwave for about 10 days and now it's back and working perfectly again.
customer_reviews.author: rambseigh

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to make my review after about a month of use. Thus far I am very, very happy with the results that I'm getting from this microwave. It heats my food just fine without the carousel models that I had before. It does take a little getting used to, and beep sound is kind of loud so I anticipate the finish of the meal in the microwave and open the door prior to the beep so I don't get that very loud screeching sound. The price is a little high, however, if you wait for a sale you can get it for a reasonable amount.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microwave for my frat house kitchen. It works great. There's no turntable to clean (or break). Even without a turntable it heats the food evenly. It doesn't include a clock and has a bit of a learning curve. I made a photocopy of the manual's "How to Operate" page and placed it on top of the unit. Everyone knows how to use it now.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T

customer_reviews.title: Solid machine
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my house. It is easy to use and easy to clean. It is NSF approved. It is not huge, but its big enough to hold a dinner plate, so it is adequate for me. The beeping at the end of the cycle is a bit annoying. I find myself rushing to open the door so it stops, but this is minor. My previous microwave was an American made Radar Range from Amana. I had that thing for 30 years. It never died. I gave it away. After a remodel it looked too dated in my new kitchen, this Panasonic fits right in.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyAit

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a cheap microwave
customer_reviews.text: I got sick of microwave ovens dying after a couple of years, so I spent a little extra and got this beauty. Despite the name, it's an entry-level commercial microwave. There's no turntable - you just set the food in the oven and it stays still while it cooks. This really reduces the amount of food that gets splattered around, and the lack of a turntable means that it's ridiculously easy to clean. Two minor quibbles: the beep (there's only one) is quite a bit louder than a typical household microwave, and the door hinge feels worn after only a few months of use. Neither of those are big deals, though. I love this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic 1054F
customer_reviews.text: This microwave oven arrived promptly without damage. However, I installed it after the return date. This microwave did not work properly as the program buttons #6 and # 10 and the programing function did not work. Panasonic support was non -existent I had it repaired at a Panasonic repair facility in Raleigh but Panasonic would not authorize the repair. Basically this microwave was junk without support when shipped from the Chinese factory. H Richardson MD
customer_reviews.author: therese maria hennig

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a roll of the dice on how long it will keep cooking
customer_reviews.text: Good size for a small studio apartment. Loud beeps. Cooked evenly. Stopped cooking food less than 2 years after purchase. Warranty support is difficult, apparently there's one guy for the Eastern U.S. who went on vacation for weeks, then they call you, you call them, then they don't call you back, rise, repeat. Overall result: Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Adelman

customer_reviews.title: easy for her to use and only cooks 6 min
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother, easy for her to use and only cooks 6 min. max. She has a hard time with her memory and after reading other reports here it made sence to buy her this one. Peace of mind for me now and for her. Wow I just tried it myself works great.
customer_reviews.author: douglas kempher

customer_reviews.title: Microwave
customer_reviews.text: We looked hard to find a microwave that will work with our older electrical system and does not have a rotating tray - as the trays reduce the size of what you put in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want: pay more for great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the microwave you’ve been looking for. Yes it costs more than a “home” version but after buying two top-rated consumer microwaves and both having issues with a platter motor, I got this. It has no weak motor turning a platter that gets dirty underneath. Super easy to clean with no sharp corners inside for dirt. Keypad is easy to learn. My daughter’s school has these and they last through hundreds of use every day by high schoolers. Also, before purchasing I looked into warranty support and because it’s not consumer but professional product I was able to speak with my local authorized repair center: not placed on hold! Far superior support compared to the consumer side of Panasonic!
customer_reviews.author: NMNM

customer_reviews.title: A solid choice.
customer_reviews.text: I worked with these microwaves in many commercial kitchens. I gave longevity 4 stars because I have seen them fail, though it was always in a commercial setting, so it was in a very busy heavy use setting. When my home microwave finally died, I sprung the extra cash and replaced it with this. I have no doubt this will be the last microwave I buy for my home.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Stegman

customer_reviews.title: all it needs is a "that was easy" button
customer_reviews.text: my favorite microwave. no fancy gadgets, unneccesary moving parts, hinges or buttons. Its compact and space efficient, but also built like a beast and should last a nice long time. NSF means there are not crevices for food to fall into making it extraordinarily easy to clean. my favorite feature is the "smart" buttons. I call them dumb buttons because they are so easy to use. Close the door and hit time you want on...that's it! they are smart buttons in that you can program them to do things other than whats on the keypad. no autosensing, or popcorn buttons or any of that stuff.
customer_reviews.author: K. Andria

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Practical and Good Looking!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast free shipping from Amazon. It arrived on Sat morning just when we needed it. The oven is minimalist looking, simple and stylish! The dial timer and door handel are the best features, making the oven so easy to use. Hope it'll out last the one it replaces which was a consumer Panasonic and good only for about 3 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Y Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Apparently a Good Machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine for the office. We quickly discovered the 2:30 button didn't work. Amazon sent a replacement. The replacement has worked fine under heavy use so far -- for about a month. The construction of the machine is solid. It has a tremendous ease of use. Braille on the buttons if there's a need. I'd recommend this machine. But because the first one was defective, and there are a few reviews complaining about short life and defects, I'll update in 6 months or so. UPDATE: After serving the needs of over 50 folks for nearly two years, this machine is working perfectly. I'd now *highly* recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Chess Jurist

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it Thursday, and it was delivered Sunday. This cool looking microwave is very substantial and works in an outstanding manner. We tested heating up a teapot of cold water (necessary for a decent pot of tea). In our previous, honking old microwave with 1450 watts of power, it took 4 minutes 45 seconds for heating sufficiently. This little microwave took 3 minutes to heat even a little hotter than the big old one. The bell to tell you time's up was nice and clear. This is a champ in every way.
customer_reviews.author: jettrink

customer_reviews.title: Company Breakroom Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My company of 20 production workers uses this microwave in our breakroom. It’s used pretty regularly during the day M-F and is perfect so far. Heats up super fast so people are in and out quickly, and is nice that there are no rotating parts. Super easy to clean, Heavy duty and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Work horse at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Well I sure am glad I got this from my 38 degree fridge into a crock, chili hot to serve in 90 seconds in most cases Easy to clean read and work. I use at my place of business Traditions Pub in Fillmore Wisconsin. See our Facebook page. Dave and Cindy Steffen Traditions Pub
customer_reviews.author: Dad who reviews

customer_reviews.title: Superior cooking compared to turn table style microwaves.
customer_reviews.text: We love this Panasonic NE-1054F microwave. It is easy to use, clean, and operate. Purchased it in December 2018 and have had zero issues with the machine. I would not go back to a turn table style microwave again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T.

customer_reviews.title: LIKE IT !
customer_reviews.text: GOOD so far. . .very easy to use. Really like the handle vs a push button door. Only disapointmnt; description says "Stainless", detailed description says "stainless front and wrap". When it arrived,...I was disapointed to see only the front is stainless, the rest of the oven is painted grey. I think that's a little cheesy in this price point for a 0.8 cu ft microwave. The Panasonic oven this replaced was much larger, less expensive, AND ALL STAINLESS. . .but with the awful push button door. . .the reason for this replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Bryan

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: For a commercial microwave it’s just ok. Takes a while to heat foods. Heats foods near the back faster than items in the front near the door. Should be easier to use, less pressing of buttons especially for commercial use. I need a second microwave for my restaurant but I doubt I’d buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: LTY

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Works, prefer these to the push button doors and carousel microwave. Compact too. Sounds kinda hollow when closing/opening, not has sturdy has the Sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Ragmack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for homes with kids
customer_reviews.text: I needed a microwave that's more kid friendly and kid durable than the crap down at Target. This fits the bill perfectly; simple and tough, easy to clean, no rotating plate to fall on the floor. Nobody needs gimmicks like dedicated buttons for popcorn or potatoes anyway. The only drawback is an extra loud end-of-cycle buzzer. I might try to mute that a little. Despite being commercial, it's great that this microwave can easily do lower power or multi-stage heating too.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this microwave a few years now and love it. Those turntables are a nightmare. This has been so easy to clean, warms food great, looks great, and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Not good for restaurant  use.
customer_reviews.text: It says its a commercial unit but its not much of a restaurant kitchen capacity. Heats rather slowly, very small, only heats one item at a time. I should have returned it but I had hopes it would magically get better. Or maybe I was too lazy to pack it up and ship it back lol.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: One dial is all you need
customer_reviews.text: Having just the one dial, by which one indicates the duration for which to cook, this microwave serves as an exemplary case in user interface design. Plus, it'll get your food hot.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dean

customer_reviews.title: not working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in april and it no longer heats. I sent off to be fixed and got it back still not heating!!!!!! rip off
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one I have purchased. I have 3 microwaves on 2 different floors and I will continue to replace my old microwaves with this one. It is compact, reliable and easy to use. Great microwave for high traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Speed matters and this is slow and broken
customer_reviews.text: Just over a year Not working Takes longer to cook vs when new Not worth it Want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in august. Have used daily. 7 months later it no longer turns on. For the price you would expect it to last longer than the walmart brands. Save your money. Not worth the money for the duration.
customer_reviews.author: louella chacon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect simplicity
customer_reviews.text: Having elderly parents, this simple microwave with limited time settings is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: E&K B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly and holds up year after year. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, it does as it is suppose to do. It replaced another Panasonic unit that I purchased back in 1993, which died last week. I hope this new microwave last as long as my old one. It is made pretty well and sturdy, just as good as the old unit. However I wish they had made door of glass rather than plastic. Keep in mind that when cleaning the door use a mild soap and treat it with kid gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Not In a Small Town

customer_reviews.title: ... 4 months in and this is by far the best microwave I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 4 months in and this is by far the best microwave I've ever owned. Evenly heats, very easy to clean, and very simple to control. Also, you can configure it to turn off the beeping which I always found annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett D.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it so far, easy to use, easy to clean and not too big. Cooking times are faster than our old 800 watt microwave which is nice, though I wish it had a timer and defrost function.
customer_reviews.author: gercaro

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 92-year-old mother in law. So far so good she's able to use it with some success. After a few months I will update this review if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: JulesE

customer_reviews.title: Good for elderly
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my elderly father - just twist the knob, one heat setting, and it doesn't go above 6 minutes, so reduces chance of fire. Gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because of it being pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Exellent Microwave that is simple to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, well built micro. Unlike other commercial micros, this one is programmable. The programming is only intended to change certain basic functionality such as enabling the quick-start feature, turning off the beeper etc. It's easy to use and heats up food quickly. It's also easy to clean because it doesn't have (or need) and carousel.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money, it's a very cool piece.
customer_reviews.text: This is all the microwave anyone ever needs. And it looks boss.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B.

customer_reviews.title: excellent simple microwave for office or home
customer_reviews.text: excellent microwave, as simple as it gets to operate with only one dial, you don't need glasses to see what you are doing. I love it. this is good for a small office break room if you want a complicated microwave with different power levels, popcorn buttons, vegetable sensors this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Company Break Rooms
customer_reviews.text: We use these microwaves in our employee break rooms and that last way longer than the standard household microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Tina McKillip

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I have this commercial grade microwave for just over two years and it doesn't hear anymore. Moderate use a shelf of its one. Disappointing. I had way cheaper product a last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: CARTERA_Bags

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 22 months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less than two years in a company lunch room. (6 days/week, 3 shifts) The other Panasonic microwave we bought a year before this one (1022F) is still operating, as are two light commercial duty Amana's.
customer_reviews.author: Continental Casting

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work. Busy ER staff lounge. Everyone loves it. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: Hard working Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easy to use, adjustable power settings. Love no rotating turntable to mess with. Interior and exterior are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, simple microwave
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a simple microwave with few moving parts to tear up or wear out. This is a simple oven, large enough for our needs. The handle on the door was what prompted us to choose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hager

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my family restaurant, works great, just the right size
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product...you guys rock... totally dudessss. lol but for sure it's a great product. i had the exact same one and reordered the same one because the last one lasted 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: J.L

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned about the cost, but am very happy with the product. It seems to be worth every penny. Much more efficient that our previous turntable model. Not whisper quiet operation, but not loud. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect, with a small footprint and even, rapid heating, it is serving me well. Nice discrete look with simple button operations. I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: An observent customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent home/personal use commercial microwave
customer_reviews.text: This solid, durable commercial microwave is very easy to use and extremely easy to clean. NOT having a turn-table is plus. Food is heated evenly and thoroughly every time.
customer_reviews.author: B Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Have to change programming
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to go from high to defrost and in busy kitchen you have to think first.
customer_reviews.author: Arlyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and easy to clean. Powerful and compact. The ability to turn off the beeps is icing on the cake. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Maier

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my mother to use as she becomes more forgetful in her aging years.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Owned for one year now. It's been excellent. Much better quality than the typical plastic junk microwaves.
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Love this microwave!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little microwave because it fit perfectly in the space allotted. It's big enough for a large dinner plate or medium serving dish and heats food evenly. It has good functionality and is easy to use. I'm very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anna L.

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I though this microwave was going to be larger. I thought it was suppose to have a turn table. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: DFolks

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: This microwave has been and will continue to be our standard microwave, as we replace older microwaves from our 100 plus units. has a great look and is very functional and user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: works great.
customer_reviews.text: If you have an older person, get it . Very simple, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: great microwave!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great microwave. So easy to clean, opens nicely and feels durable. Simple knob from 0-6minutes. It sounds like a normal microwave, the beep loudness is normal too. About the same as our old 90's microwave. Also about the same power as our old one, decently powerful. It looks nice, but still a little weird with the words on the front describing times for heating up certain meals.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin S. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: and the lack of a turn-table makes it super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have no complaints. It heats food quickly and evenly, and the lack of a turn-table makes it super easy to clean. The stainless steel looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: the owls are not what they seem

customer_reviews.title: Awesome microwave oven
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) Build like a tank/Well made, 2) Easy to clean, 3) Easy to use, 4) Energy efficient Cons: 1) Not the fastest, 2) Not the largest
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a microwave that you don't have to throw out and replace every other year.
customer_reviews.author: Joel DC

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Came without dings or dents. Works well. It did take me a while to figure out how to cook something for twice the time on the cook though. Hmmmm. Otherwise, works fine.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Great for office!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for office use. We are a 24/7 call center with about 75 employees. We even bought a second.
customer_reviews.author: AdrianT

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It's easy to clean and it's indestructible
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for a busy office break room. I love it. It's easy to clean and it's indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this microwave in our small office for 2 years and 3 months. It takes forever to heat even a bowl of soup. Not commercial grade or strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have 60 people sharing this microwave and it has been great! Comes with a one year manufacturer's warranty
customer_reviews.text: When the old donated microwave at the office died, I jumped at the opportunity to replace it with this commercial microwave. We have 60 people sharing this microwave and it has been great! Comes with a one year manufacturer's warranty. Easy to clean and operate. Perfect size. Highly recommend for any office with lots of people using it daily. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Has no turntable because it doesn't need it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Has no turntable because it doesn't need it.

customer_reviews.title: working out great too bad it doesn't come with a turn table
customer_reviews.text: working out great too bad it doesn't come with a turn table.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price but not powerful enough for coffee shop
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price but not powerful enough for coffee shop

customer_reviews.title: Size variation
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement of earlier microwave. The size is little smaller than earlier one and prevents me to cook in 1/3 size cambro.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but I find the buttons a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but I find the buttons a little confusing. I had a similar Panasonic commercial grade and it was easier to quickly find the buttons I needed with that one.
customer_reviews.author: JBu

customer_reviews.title: We are more than satisfied with this Microwave
customer_reviews.text: We are more than satisfied with this Microwave. It is being used by staff at a Rehabilitation Hospital, will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Deb

customer_reviews.title: it was a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this microwave for our office's kitchen and it stopped working less than 5 months later. We shipped it back to the manufacturer per the seller's instructions for repair but the manufacturer said it was damaged in transit so they will not fix nor replace it. So, it was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ITelagen, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great microwave at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: After an inspection they required we use commercial grade microwaves in our break room.. This is a great microwave at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave! Used in low volume kitchen and works great!
customer_reviews.author: T-Fam

customer_reviews.title: I bought it two months ago it still work very ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it two months ago it still work very well. It heat the food evenly and very convenient to use . As many buyer said that the big concern is the very loud beep sound ! It really really very very loudly and five beeps ! I chose to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Works up to my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This item is used multiple times daily. Lives up to all my expectations and then some!! Panasonic paid off again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was nice to not have a turntable to clean
customer_reviews.text: The microwave was everything I expected. It was nice to not have a turntable to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Almost a perfect microwave.
customer_reviews.text: Love the microwave but I have to leave out of star because the knob is plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Scrimpsher

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these microwaves and one works great, the other I have had some trouble with consistent heating.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: PTO purchase
customer_reviews.text: The PTO purchased this for use by students in the cafeteria. It is perfect for the purpose. The dial makes operation very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Jock Derouin

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave
customer_reviews.text: Neat - it's not the plate that rotates, but (invisible to you) the heating element. Easier to clean, and we always used to have trouble with the plate not sitting right on the drive. Easy to use. Only complaint: It does not have a clock on the display. We'll have to buy a separate kitchen clock.
customer_reviews.author: Dharma's Cat

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this microwave
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this microwave! Simple, functional, perfect. Love the real handle, the easy to read buttons, and ease of use!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Nylene Robertson

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 of the same model that work great!. I tried to have this swapped for ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Did not work properly . After door is closed and after time is selected the timer will run but it does not heat unless you push the door in an addition 1/8". This was installed in an office building and people are hard to train. I have 2 of the same model that work great!. I tried to have this swapped for a new one. the seller directed me to the manufacturer( for this I give them 1 star) The manufacturer will not have it shipped for repairs . They expect me to drive it to their service location. This defeats the purpose of me using amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Normand

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have 3-coffee stations with these microwae ovens in them for our employes and they get used alot.So i needed a good product to fill that need,and these do the job.
customer_reviews.author: lmcouser

product_meta.title: Panasonic Countertop Commercial Microwave Oven with 10 Programmable Memory, Touch Screen Control and Bottom Energy Feed, 1000W, 0.8 Cu. Ft. (Stainless Steel), 5"
product_meta.description: Style:Touch screen controlThe Panasonic NE-1054F Heavy Duty Commercial Grade Microwave occupies minimal space on a countertop or table, ideal for full-service and fast-food restaurants, convenience stores, offices, hotels, cafeterias, breakrooms and other business-related settings, plus heavy home or dorm room usage. Equipped with 1000W power and a convenient 0.8-cubic-foot interior capacity, this Panasonic commercial microwave oven features a bottom energy feed system and no-turntable design to bring foods closer to the cooking source for quicker heating for a variety of menu items, like dinner plates, large casserole dishes, glass bowls, coffee mugs and other common kitchenware used for heating and cooking. This commercial microwave oven's door is unique; without the hassle of moving parts like those found in push-button doors or trigger-activated handles, Panasonic's grab & go door handle is bonded to the stainless-steel door to ensure fast, reliable performance and long-lasting durability—perfect for high-usage applications. The commercial oven's electronic touch-control keypad comes with Braille for enhanced accessibility and ease of use, and includes 10 programmable memory pads and a 20-memory capability. A 99:99-minute capacity and 10 preset time settings ranging from 10 seconds up to 3:30 minutes add cooking flexibility. There's also a program list/cycle counter, six power levels to choose from, and two and three-stage cooking. NSF and UL Commercial approved, this Panasonic commercial microwave oven also provides an anti-theft component, tone control, self diagnostics, and a see-through oven door and interior light for checking on food at a glance. Chef technical support is also available. With its sleek-looking silver wrap and stainless-steel front panel and door, the Panasonic NE-1054F commercial microwave oven makes a high-efficiency addition to any business, home or dorm room setting. Exterior dimensions (HxWxD): 12-inch x 20-1/8-inch x 16-1/2-inch, Interior: 8-1/16-inch x 13-inch x 13-inch.
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY COMMERCIAL GRADE MICROWAVE Ideal for full-service and fast-food restaurants, convenience stores, offices, hotels, cafeterias, breakrooms and other business-related settings, plus heavy home or dorm room usage

BOTTOM ENERGY FEED SYSTEM FOR FAST COOKING RESULTS 1000W power, and 0.8-cu. ft. capacity; Energy travels less distance to reach the food, for increased efficiency in heating dinner plates, large casserole dishes, coffee mugs and other common kitchenware
NO-HASSLE GRAB & GO HANDLE Ensures fast, smooth, long-lasting performance; Also features see-through oven door, interior light, anti-theft component, tone control and self-diagnostics

TOUCH-CONTROL KEYPAD WITH BRAILLE Programmable and manual operation provides 10 programmable memory pads and 20-memory capability plus 99:99-minute capacity, presets from 10 seconds up to 3:30 minutes, 6 power levels and program list/cycle counter
COMPACT, SPACE-SAVING DESIGN Occupies minimal space on a countertop or table; Exterior dimensions (HxWxD): 12-inch x 20-1/8-inch x 16-1/2-inch, Interior: 8-1/16-inch x 13-inch x 13-inch
